The five kinds of people who eat only fr: A person may eat only from the almsbowl because of stupidity and folly.
Or because of wicked desires, being naturally full of desires.
Or because of madness and mental disorder.
Or because it is praised by the Buddhas and their disciples.
Or for the sake of having few wishes, for the sake of contentment, self-effacement, seclusion, and simplicity.
